name: SNV - NETHERLANDS DEVELOPMENT ORGANISATION
goal:
SNV is dedicated to a society in which all people, irrespective of race, class or gender, enjoy the freedom to pursue their own sustainable development.
SNV works with governments, local development partners, businesses, knowledge institutes and low-income communities, so that together we can transform ideas into policy, policy into action, and action into results.
From 2016 to 2018, SNV will improve the quality of life for over 20 million people by developing locally-owned approaches, strengthening governance systems and improving markets for the poor.
We will use our technical knowledge, 50 plus years of experience, passionate staff, extensive local presence and global footprint, to make a lasting difference in people’s lives.
interests: Agriculture, Budget, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Youth
euInitiatives: EU policies and funding programs in the following three sectors: 1. Agricultrure; 2. Renewable Energy; 3. Water, Sanitation and Hygiëne.
